title: E318 Iron Man Chris Nikic
itunes:title: Iron Man Chris Nikic
description:
Theo sits down with Chris Nikic, the first person with Down Syndrome to complete the Ironman Triathlon. They discuss the challenges Chris faces during his training, what he uses to motivate himself & others, and what he's looking for in the perfect woman.
